page.title: 16Pendomer: Leisure
page.content: For those who live in Pendomer, leisure activities necessitate a journey at least to Hardington or East Coker, more probably Yeovil. Halstock, however, is particularly well supplied with activity groups for a village of its size (less than 400 inhabitants). There is a large WI, both a men's and women's Royal British Legion, music group, youth club, amenities group and a very active horticultural society, which among other things holds two shows a year. (There are many keen gardeners in the village!) All these groups forgather in the school. Serious cultural entertainment such as orchestral concerts, opera or drama are not so easy. It is necessary to travel to Exeter or Bath for most such outings - forty plus miles each way, no joke on a winter evening.
